text: EXW can stand for: *Elite Xtreme Wrestling, now known as Future Stars of Wrestling. One of the tag team champions was Val Venus. *Enlisted Expeditionary Warfare Specialist, a qualification badge of the U.S. Navy *Explosion welding, a solid state process where welding is accomplished by accelerating one of the components at extremely high velocity through the use of chemical explosives *Ex Works, Incoterm term where the seller makes the goods available at its premises
title: EXW
